page.title: 07RELIGION
page.content: There are three places of worship in our area ,two are churches and one is a chapel. {Hinstock chapel A very small sandstone building. It has recently had alterations. The old pews have been taken out and comfortable chairs have been put in. The sunday school,the discovers,meets once a fortnight. {Hinstock Church St Oswald's Hinstock church is made out large blocks of sandstone. It is said that a church has stood there since Saxon times. The present church was built in 1720. {Sambrook Church ST. Luke's A Victorian sandstone building. The rector of both churches is Rev.G.Atkins.
